body:
**Describe the bug**

When adding a custom extension, a model appears. By default, the buttons do not appear. I open the Goose desktop window to fullscreen on my large monitor and then can see the Add button but not any others.

After adding 1-2 environment variables, the height of the modal grows and the buttons are no longer in view. So I can't even click Add.

A workaround is to tab to the buttons and press enter, but I'd have to know the position of them since they are not visible.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Go to '...'
2. Click on 'Settings'
3. Scroll down to 'Custom Extension'
4. Add a few environment variables

**Expected behavior**
A scrollable modal that allows me to get to the buttons

**Screenshots**

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/a4a28f76-827a-4373-9aab-50c2ea9064e4)
title: Custom Extension Modal Isn't Scrollable
